desc: Set the status for an AI assistant thread.

token.desc: Auth token with which to authenticate the session

channel_id.desc: Channel ID containing the assistant thread.

thread_ts.desc: Message timestamp of the thread of where to set the status.

status.desc: Status of the specified bot user, e.g. 'is thinking...'

channel_not_found.desc: Error returned when given an invalid channel_id

invalid_thread_ts.desc: Error returned when given an invalid thread_ts

error.description: Typical error response for invalid channel
